description.zh-cn: 日本自由民主党籍政治人物，历任第90、96-98任内阁总理大臣。他是日本宪政史上在任时间最长的首相，任内推行“安倍经济学”，强化美日同盟，并主导《跨太平洋伙伴全面进步协定》。他于2022年7月8日在奈良市进行选举演说时遇刺身亡。
description.en: A Japanese politician from the Liberal Democratic Party who served as the 90th and 96th-98th Prime Minister of Japan. He was the longest-serving prime minister in Japanese history, known for his signature 'Abenomics' economic policies, strengthening the U.S.-Japan alliance, and leading the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership. He was assassinated on July 8, 2022, while delivering a campaign speech in Nara.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，安倍晋三的父亲。他曾担任外务大臣、内阁官房长官等职务，是自由民主党内的重要领袖。
description.en: A Japanese politician and the father of Shinzo Abe. He served in prominent roles including Minister for Foreign Affairs and Chief Cabinet Secretary, and was a key leader within the Liberal Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 岸信介的女儿，安倍晋太郎的妻子，安倍晋三的母亲。在日本政坛被称为“教母”。
description.en: The daughter of Nobusuke Kishi, wife of Shintaro Abe, and mother of Shinzo Abe. She was known as the 'godmother' in Japanese politics.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，安倍晋三的祖父。他是一位和平主义者，曾在二战期间担任众议院议员，反对东条英机政府。
description.en: A Japanese politician and the paternal grandfather of Shinzo Abe. He was a pacifist who served in the House of Representatives during World War II and opposed the Tojo government.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，安倍晋三的外祖父。他曾担任第56、57任内阁总理大臣。二战后被列为甲级战犯嫌疑人，但未被起诉，是战后日本保守派政治的核心人物，对安倍晋三影响深远。
description.en: A Japanese politician and the maternal grandfather of Shinzo Abe. He served as the 56th and 57th Prime Minister of Japan. After World War II, he was detained as a suspected Class A war criminal but was never indicted. He became a central figure in post-war conservative Japanese politics and was a major influence on Shinzo Abe.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，岸信介的弟弟，安倍晋三的外叔祖父。他曾担任第61、62、63任内阁总理大臣，是日本在任时间第二长的首相。
description.en: A Japanese politician, younger brother of Nobusuke Kishi, and the maternal granduncle of Shinzo Abe. He served as the 61st, 62nd, and 63rd Prime Minister of Japan, holding the second-longest tenure in the office.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三的妻子。她以与丈夫在某些政治观点上持不同意见而闻名，并曾涉入森友学园问题等争议。
description.en: The wife of Shinzo Abe. She is known for publicly disagreeing with her husband on some political issues and was involved in controversies such as the Moritomo Gakuen scandal.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，安倍晋三的弟弟。他出生时姓安倍，后被过继给舅舅岸信和而改姓。曾担任防卫大臣。
description.en: A Japanese politician and the younger brother of Shinzo Abe. Born with the surname Abe, he was adopted by his maternal uncle Kishi Nobukazu and took the Kishi surname. He has served as the Minister of Defense.

description.zh-cn: 日本企业家，安倍晋三的哥哥，曾任三菱商事旗下包装事业的执行长。
description.en: A Japanese businessman and the elder brother of Shinzo Abe. He served as an executive in Mitsubishi Corporation's packaging business.

description.zh-cn: 日本的主要保守派政党，自1955年成立以来长期执政。安倍晋三曾两度担任其总裁。
description.en: The main conservative political party in Japan, which has been in power for most of the period since its formation in 1955. Shinzo Abe served as its president twice.

description.zh-cn: 自由民主党内最大的派阀，由福田赳夫创立。安倍晋三长期是该派阀的核心成员，并于2021年至2022年担任会长，期间该派阀被称为“安倍派”。
description.en: The largest faction within the Liberal Democratic Party, founded by Takeo Fukuda. Shinzo Abe was a core member for a long time and served as its chairman from 2021 to 2022, during which it was known as the 'Abe Faction'.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任第87-89任内阁总理大臣。他是安倍晋三在政坛的重要提携者，曾任命安倍为内阁官房长官，并支持其接任首相。
description.en: A Japanese politician who served as the 87th-89th Prime Minister of Japan. He was a key mentor to Shinzo Abe in politics, appointing him as Chief Cabinet Secretary and supporting him as his successor.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，在安倍晋三第二次执政期间长期担任内阁官房长官，并在安倍辞职后接任第99任内阁总理大臣。
description.en: A Japanese politician who served as Chief Cabinet Secretary for a long time during Shinzo Abe's second administration and succeeded him as the 99th Prime Minister of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，在安倍内阁中曾担任外务大臣等职，现任内阁总理大臣。安倍晋三去世后，他决定为其举行国葬。
description.en: A Japanese politician who served as Minister for Foreign Affairs in the Abe cabinet and is the current Prime Minister of Japan. After Shinzo Abe's death, he decided to hold a state funeral for him.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三第二次执政期间推行的经济政策，以“三支箭”（大胆的货币政策、灵活的财政政策、促进民间投资的增长战略）为核心，旨在摆脱日本长期的通货紧缩和经济停滞。
description.en: The economic policies advocated by Shinzo Abe during his second term as Prime Minister, centered on the 'three arrows' of bold monetary policy, flexible fiscal policy, and a growth strategy to encourage private investment, aimed at pulling Japan out of long-term deflation and economic stagnation.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三提出的外交战略，强调与共享自由、民主、法治等普世价值的国家加强合作。
description.en: A diplomatic strategy proposed by Shinzo Abe that emphasizes strengthening cooperation with countries that share universal values such as freedom, democracy, and the rule of law.

description.zh-cn: 日本与美国之间的军事与安全合作关系，是日本外交的基石。安倍晋三在其任内致力于强化这一同盟关系。
description.en: The military and security cooperation relationship between Japan and the United States, which is the cornerstone of Japanese diplomacy. Shinzo Abe was committed to strengthening this alliance during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 2022年7月8日，日本前内阁总理大臣安倍晋三在奈良市进行选举演说时遭枪击身亡的事件。该事件对日本社会造成巨大冲击。
description.en: The event on July 8, 2022, in which former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe was shot and killed while delivering a campaign speech in Nara. The incident sent shockwaves through Japanese society.

description.zh-cn: 刺杀日本前首相安倍晋三的嫌犯。他表示，其行凶动机是因其母亲向统一教大量捐款导致家庭破产，而他认为安倍晋三与该教会有所关联。
description.en: The suspect in the assassination of former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe. He stated that his motive was related to the Unification Church, which he blamed for his family's bankruptcy due to his mother's large donations, and he believed Abe had ties to the church.

description.zh-cn: 一个源于韩国的新兴宗教。刺杀安倍晋三的嫌犯山上彻也称，因该教会与其家庭的财务纠纷以及他认为安倍与该教会有联系，而产生恨意并实施犯罪。
description.en: A new religious movement originating from South Korea. The suspect in Shinzo Abe's assassination, Tetsuya Yamagami, cited a grudge against the church over his family's financial troubles and Abe's perceived links to it as his motive for the crime.

description.zh-cn: 一宗涉及学校法人森友学园以极低价格购得国有土地的政治丑闻。该丑闻牵涉到安倍晋三及其夫人安倍昭惠，并引发财务省官员篡改公文的事件，严重打击了安倍内阁的支持率。
description.en: A political scandal involving the school corporation Moritomo Gakuen acquiring state-owned land at a heavily discounted price. The scandal implicated Shinzo Abe and his wife Akie Abe, and led to the falsification of official documents by Ministry of Finance officials, severely damaging the Abe cabinet's approval ratings.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统。在任期间，他与安倍晋三建立了密切的个人关系，两人通过“高尔夫外交”等方式频繁互动。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States. During his presidency, he developed a close personal relationship with Shinzo Abe, with frequent interactions including 'golf diplomacy'.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统。安倍晋三在任期间多次与其会面，试图解决南千岛群岛（日称北方四岛）领土争议并签订和平条约，两人建立了深厚的个人情谊。
description.en: President of Russia. Shinzo Abe met with him multiple times during his tenure in an attempt to resolve the Southern Kuril Islands territorial dispute and sign a peace treaty, and the two developed a strong personal rapport.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京都的一所私立大学，安倍晋三于1977年毕业于该校法学部政治学系。
description.en: A private university located in Tokyo, Japan. Shinzo Abe graduated from its Faculty of Law, Department of Political Science, in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 日本国会的下议院。安倍晋三自1993年起连续十次当选众议院议员，直至2022年任内去世。
description.en: The lower house of the National Diet of Japan. Shinzo Abe was elected to the House of Representatives for ten consecutive terms from 1993 until his death in office in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋太郎是安倍晋三的父亲。
description.en: Shintaro Abe was Shinzo Abe's father.

description.zh-cn: 安倍洋子是安倍晋三的母亲。
description.en: Yoko Abe was Shinzo Abe's mother.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三与安倍昭惠于1987年结婚，婚姻关系直至安倍晋三去世。
description.en: Shinzo Abe and Akie Abe were married in 1987, and their marriage lasted until his death.

description.zh-cn: 安倍宽信是安倍晋三的兄长。
description.en: Hironobu Abe is Shinzo Abe's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 岸信夫是安倍晋三的弟弟。
description.en: Nobuo Kishi is Shinzo Abe's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 安倍宽是安倍晋太郎的父亲，即安倍晋三的祖父。
description.en: Kan Abe was Shintaro Abe's father, making him Shinzo Abe's paternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 岸信介是安倍洋子的父亲，即安倍晋三的外祖父。
description.en: Nobusuke Kishi was Yoko Abe's father, making him Shinzo Abe's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 佐藤荣作是岸信介的弟弟，即安倍晋三的外叔祖父。
description.en: Eisaku Satō was Nobusuke Kishi's younger brother, making him Shinzo Abe's maternal granduncle.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三的童年深受外祖父岸信介的影响，他非常崇拜岸信介，并常表示自己继承了“岸信介的DNA”。
description.en: Shinzo Abe's childhood was greatly influenced by his maternal grandfather Nobusuke Kishi. He greatly admired Kishi and often stated that he inherited 'Kishi's DNA'.

degree.zh-cn: 法学部政治学系文学学士
degree.en: Bachelor of Arts in Political Science, Faculty of Law

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三于1977年3月毕业于成蹊大学。
description.en: Shinzo Abe graduated from Seikei University in March 1977.

position.zh-cn: 众议院议员、总裁、干事长等
position.en: Member of the House of Representatives, President, Secretary-General, etc.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三是日本自由民主党的成员，并曾两度担任该党总裁（党魁）。
description.en: Shinzo Abe was a member of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan and served as its president on two separate occasions.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三是自由民主党最大派阀清和政策研究会的成员，并于2021年11月11日至2022年7月8日担任会长。
description.en: Shinzo Abe was a member of the LDP's largest faction, Seiwa Seisaku Kenkyūkai, and served as its chairman from November 11, 2021, to July 8, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三自1993年起担任日本众议院议员，直至在任内去世。
description.en: Shinzo Abe served as a member of the House of Representatives of Japan from 1993 until his death in office.

description.zh-cn: 小泉纯一郎任命安倍晋三为内阁官房长官，并推举其为接班人，为安倍首次担任首相铺平了道路。
description.en: Junichiro Koizumi appointed Shinzo Abe as Chief Cabinet Secretary and endorsed him as his successor, paving the way for Abe's first term as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三在其第二次首相任内推出了以“三支箭”为核心的“安倍经济学”改革政策。
description.en: During his second term as prime minister, Shinzo Abe launched the 'Abenomics' reform policy, centered on 'three arrows'.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三在其首相任内，将强化美日同盟作为其外交与安全政策的核心。
description.en: During his tenure as Prime Minister, Shinzo Abe made strengthening the U.S.-Japan alliance a core element of his foreign and security policy.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三与时任美国总统唐纳·川普建立了密切的个人信赖关系，两人通过高尔夫等活动频繁互动。
description.en: Shinzo Abe established a close personal relationship of trust with then-U.S. President Donald Trump, and the two interacted frequently through activities such as golf.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三与俄罗斯总统普丁多次会谈，两人情谊深厚，致力于解决两国间的领土争端。
description.en: Shinzo Abe and Russian President Vladimir Putin held numerous meetings, developing a strong rapport in their efforts to resolve the territorial dispute between their countries.

description.zh-cn: 森友学园丑闻导致安倍晋三的民望下滑，并对他的政府造成了严重的信任危机。
description.en: The Moritomo Gakuen scandal caused a decline in Shinzo Abe's popularity and created a severe crisis of confidence in his government.

description.zh-cn: 关于政府主办的“赏樱会”费用和邀请标准不透明的争议，重挫了安倍晋三与自由民主党的支持率。
description.en: The controversy over the expenses and opaque invitation standards for the government-sponsored cherry blossom viewing party significantly damaged the approval ratings of Shinzo Abe and the LDP.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三在奈良市发表演讲时遇刺身亡，事件导致其政治生涯和生命的终结。
description.en: Shinzo Abe was assassinated while giving a speech in Nara, an event that ended his political career and life.

description.zh-cn: 山上彻也使用自制枪支枪杀了安倍晋三。
description.en: Tetsuya Yamagami assassinated Shinzo Abe using a homemade firearm.

description.zh-cn: 山上彻也表示，他因母亲向统一教大量捐款导致家庭破产而对该组织产生恨意。
description.en: Tetsuya Yamagami stated that he harbored hatred for the Unification Church because his mother's large donations to the organization led to his family's bankruptcy.

description.zh-cn: 安倍晋三基于统一教的组织票，曾出席该教团的相关活动。刺杀者山上彻也认为安倍与该教会有关联，这是他行凶的动机之一。
description.en: To secure organizational votes, Shinzo Abe attended events related to the Unification Church. The assassin, Tetsuya Yamagami, believed Abe had ties to the church, which was one of his motives for the attack.
